snippet.title: "Love" the game by Eskil Steenberg: Intro (HD).
snippet.description:
Visit our shop: http://www.shapeways.com/shops/ipeproto
Donate via PayPal: https://ipeproto.blogspot.com.br/2017/12/donations.html
Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/ipeproto

Love

An Eskil Steenberg Game
 
Eons ago, on the planet of Allegia...

Members of the Sun Tribe Of Clondo forged a powerfull artifact out of the five elements.

The artifact was so imbued with their power of seduction that would corrupt anyone who held it.

The Tribe had always shared the sun equally, but now greed clouded their minds.

The Kondosant mines in the garden of the Colossi where laid in darkness.

So the miners stole the artifact and used its power to dominate the planet and occupy all settlements.

They build the mighthy IonDrive and they used it to raid fire on anyone who dared challenge their domination.

To fight the Kondosant clans grip on Allegia: The knighthood of the Omprelly Enclave was formed.

Siphoning power from the core of Allegia they constructed the Cloudburst, a device to control the weather...

...and with a mighty rainfall they flooded the Kondosant mines and unpowered the IonDrive.

The constructors of the artifact where banished from the Clondo fold to the Solas Sanctuary.

The Outcasts built the Gindra temple and dedicated their lives to keeping the elements in harmony for the benefit of all.

They swore to lay down arms , and never again quest for power and destruction.

The artifact was cast in to the Risch depths and for eons it remained buried and forgotten.

The ion drive silenced, the sea and sand back, the sun returned to it´s path. Until one day...

...when a small tribe known as the Condita Raiders harvesting Newon gas uncoverd it as they cracked Allegias crust.

As the Artifact has returned...
...no tribe can avoid its corrupting power.
